QuestData.Title: No Pack Left Behind
QuestData.Description: The Broketooth hozen south of here killed all of my grummles. What is worse, their packages are undelivered.$b$bFortune frowns on a grummlepack undelivered.$b$bPlease, give my grummles peace on the great trail of beyond and bring their grummlepacks to me.$b$bI will see they are delivered.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 8 Grummlepacks from Camp Broketooth or The Deeper.
QuestData.CompletionText: Grummles are a simple people. We are made to explore and deliver.
QuestData.RewardText: You are good fortune for grummles.$b$bWhen we are back at a proper camp I must buy you the smelliest, luckiest incense I can find.
